question_text: Pregnancy is a risk factor for which of the following conditions?

options.A: Restless legs syndrome (RLS)
Restless Legs Syndrome (RLS) symptoms often worsen during pregnancy, especially in the third trimester.
options.B: Narcolepsy symptoms are commonly exacerbated by pregnancy.
options.C: REM Sleep Behavior Disorder (RBD) incidence increases during pregnancy.
options.D: Periodic Limb Movement Disorder (PLMD) is typically improved during pregnancy.
